entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Non-optimal Vector128 broadcasts #91973
  • Test failure: System.Memory.Tests #91972
    9.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Cng.Tests.ECDsaCngPkcs8Tests.NoPlaintextExportAllowsEncryptedPkcs8 fails on Windows.Nano.1809.Amd64.Open #91971
  • [API Proposal]: `Array.Sort` overloads with `Comparison` delegate #91970
  • Performance of System.Formats.Cbor #91969
  • Complex validation attribute constructor support in the Options validator source generator #91966
    9.0.0
  • AOT compilation fails when NoWarn spans separate lines #91965
    8.0.0
  • `RequestReJITWithInliners` silently fails for debug modules if `COMPLUS_ForceEnc` is enabled #91963
  • Perf pipeline broken with `dpkg was interrupted, you must manually run 'sudo dpkg ...` #91959
  • Process::TotalProcessorTime is about 42 times lower than expected on ARM64 Mac #91958
  • [NativeAOT] Local variables not available when debugging apps on Apple platforms #91955
    9.0.0
  • Assembly Resolution finding a mismatched version corrupts state and makes loading good version impossible #91952
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36799: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #91950
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36796: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #91948
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36793: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #91947
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36794: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #91946
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36792: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #91944
  • Cannot install `wasm-tools` workload since the latest `microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain.net6` update #91932
  • IHostedService.StopAsync(...) not called when SIGTERM issued on ACA #91926
  • [mono] Investigate enabling trimming when building libraries and functional tests on ios/tvos platforms #91923
    9.0.0
  • Microbenchmark Regressions from .NET 8 #91914
    9.0.0
  • [Http Metrics] Replace http.error.reason with OTel standard error.type #91909
    8.0.0

Closed

  • how override array with env #91939
  • OSR stress failure in libraries PGO #91654
    9.0.0
  • NET 6.0 do not recognise encoding 1252, is there an easy way to add #91940
  • createdump segfaults on RHEL8 arm64 with .NET 8 #91864
  • Why are symbols (pdbs) created for reference assemblies? #57474
    Future
  • Running tests in Release try to call testhost dotnet.exe from Debug folder #76834
    Future
  • NET 8.0 Preview 7 Performance Regression: ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance #91186
    8.0.0
  • EFCore Design v7 Package Requires Net7 System Libraries #91922
  • [OCSP Stapling] Cached bad response of Server-Side OCSP stabling in .NET7 Linux #89907
    8.0.0
  • Should GeneratedRegex method be static? #91927
  • JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_21761 failing in GC stress #91894
    9.0.0
  • SPMI asmdiff errors on Arm64 Linux #91257
    9.0.0
  • Blazor WASM: consider adding support for one-file / single-file / atomic deployments #91219
    9.0.0
  • Embedded markdown readme for NuGet packages #59630
    8.0.0
  • Exception in console in all Blazor WebAssembly apps (dotnet.6.0.16) (also in empty WebAssembly app) #86257
    8.0.0
  • JIT: "Mismatch in align instruction" in superpmi-replay #91838
    8.0.0
  • [mono] how to free object allocate using `mono_object_new_pinned` #91784
  • GC Microbenchmarks Perf Regressions: Move from Segments to Regions #73592
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Minimize net diff of binder-gen visibility/identifier-clash fix #91974
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • crashinfo.cpp/crashinfounix.cpp: use off_t instead of off64_t #91968
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Fix binder gen compile issues due to inaccessible members and identifier name clashes #91967
    NO-REVIEW, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Rename Options Validator Source Generator #91964
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Remove implicit narrowing conversions from zlib #91962
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix: Config binder generator doesn't generate code when named arguments are out of order #91961
    area-System.Configuration
  • Delete .NET Native left overs #91960
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #91956
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/8.0] dumpwriterelf: increase buffer to fit a RHEL8 arm64 page. #91953
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #91951
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #91949
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • Use `isinst` in `System.Data.Common.ObjectStorage:Set` #91945
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Move SearchValues scalar loops into IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #91937
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary use of UseCompilerGeneratedDocXmlFile #91935
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Make Options source gen support Validation attributes having constructor with array parameters #91934
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES for 8.0 release #91933
    area-Setup
  • [mono][jit] Paired stores and loads are now used for vtypes in regs on arm64 #91925
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Optimize Vector128.Create if there are some zero elements #91924
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix InPlaceRuntime layering issues #91919
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Check if loop body occured before loopTop and if so unmark alignment #91918
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #91917
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #91916
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Replace http.error.reason with OTel standard error.type #91910
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Check if loop body occured before loopTop and if so unmark alignment #91854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Metrics Feature Switch #91767
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Add documentation about contributing to config binder generator #91954
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Fix trimming solution after a test project rename #91931
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • dumpwriterelf: increase buffer to fit a RHEL8 arm64 page. #91865
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [iOS] Fix trimming warnings in HttpClientHandler.AnyMobile #91877
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, os-android, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst, 8.0.0
  • Make Options source gen support Validation attributes having constructor with params Parameter #91915
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fix illegal IR created by GetElement/ToScalar lowering #91874
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Don't log warnings for certain RemoveAttributeInstances #91866
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix `Item4` is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91470
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Disable Http3 LargeSingleHeader_ThrowsException Test #91930
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Remove ObjRefInitBlk (has a GC hole) #91906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mark `SString`'s single argument ctors as `explicit` #91822
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Handle "successful error cases" in near differ on arm64 #91783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Implement X86Base.Pause in JIT mode as well. #91912
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix invalid PGO optimization path on Nuget cache containing spaces. #90729
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Simplify AreSameType #91921
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't generate Attribute comparison helpers when classlib doesn't hav… #91920
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #91908
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #91911
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Reset OOB packages from September Release in the October Release #90561
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Remove Latin1CharSearchValues #91884
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Initial commit for libraries directory #90203
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-riscv, 9.0.0
  • Skip duplicate --info output if it is known SDK output #91900
    area-Host
  • Remove public provider from rundown session #91383
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add New Test to Track Number of Jitted Methods #91235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implement Linq CountBy method for IEnumerable and IQueryable #91507
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Hacky workaround for coredistools unsupported instructions #91668
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make src gen for property setters consistent with reflection #91899
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Arm64: Pass the small size accurately to emitIns_valid_imm_for_ldst_offset #91741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Setup internal feeds in internal builds #90637
    area-Infrastructure
  • Change LoadDomainInfo to honor requested LDAP port #89787
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [System.HashCode] Adjust nullable annotation on generic Add method which accepts IEqualityComparer #91905
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use `Unsafe.WriteUnaligned` in `BitConverter.GetBytes` #91639
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Added missing *Async overrides to TlsStream #91794
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Fix WasmLinkIcalls and WasmNativeStrip support. #91843
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Remove support for llvm versions before 14.x. #88346
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 9.0.0
  • Expose an internal ISimdVector interface and being using it to deduplicate some SIMD code #90764
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Integrate keyed DI with HttpClientFactory #90272
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 9.0.0
  • [browser] [wasm] Refactor Request Streaming to use HttpContent.CopyToAsync #91699
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] `QuicStream` reading/writing work #90253
    area-System.Net.Quic, 9.0.0
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Add optimisation of incrementing SELECT at lowering on arm64. #91262
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimise long multiply + add/sub/neg on arm64. #91886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow using VS to run host tests when libraries use different config #91873
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Merge CoreMangLib, Exceptions and Interop folders #91901
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] regArg dependcies unrolling in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs() #91904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Light up BitArray APIs with Vector512 code path #91903
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Improve the trim incompatibility message for Assembly.GetType #91876
    area-System.Reflection, linkable-framework
  • [release/8.0] Do not throw PNSE exception from NegotiateAuthentication constructor #91753
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary rid argument to dotnet-restore #91844
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] enable all MT library tests on the runtime CI pipeline #91536
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, area-Build-mono
  • Mono - CordbProcess::GetThread implementation #90733
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • BindConfiguration registers change token source with the right options name #91842
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 9.0.0
